IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/designpatterns/singleton/SingletonDemo.java", "file_content": "package org.example.designpatterns.singleton;\n\nimport java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;\nimport java.util.concurrent.Executors;\nimport java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;\n\n/**\n * \u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\u6f14\u793a\u7c7b\n * \u5c55\u793a\u5404\u79cd\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\u7684\u4f7f\u7528\u548c\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u6d4b\u8bd5\n */\npublic class SingletonDemo {\n \n public static void main(String[] args) {\n System.out.println(\"=== \u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\u6f14\u793a ===\\n\");\n \n // 1. \u997f\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\n demonstrateEagerSingleton();\n \n // 2. \u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\uff08\u7ebf\u7a0b\u4e0d\u5b89\u5168\uff09\n demonstrateLazySingleton();\n \n // 3. \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u7684\u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\n demonstrateThreadSafeSingleton();\n \n // 4. \u53cc\u91cd\u68c0\u67e5\u9501\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\n demonstrateDoubleCheckedLockingSingleton();\n \n // 5. \u9759\u6001\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\n demonstrateStaticInnerClassSingleton();\n \n // 6. \u679a\u4e3e\u5355\u4f8b\u6f14\u793a\n demonstrateEnumSingleton();\n \n // 7. \u591a\u7ebf\u7a0b\u6d4b\u8bd5\n System.out.println(\"\\n=== \u591a\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u6027\u6d4b\u8bd5 ===\");\n testThreadSafety();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateEagerSingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"1. \u997f\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff1a\");\n EagerSingleton instance1 = EagerSingleton.getInstance();\n EagerSingleton instance2 = EagerSingleton.getInstance();\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateLazySingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"2. \u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff08\u7ebf\u7a0b\u4e0d\u5b89\u5168\uff09\uff1a\");\n LazySingleton instance1 = LazySingleton.getInstance();\n LazySingleton instance2 = LazySingleton.getInstance();\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateThreadSafeSingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"3. \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u7684\u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff1a\");\n ThreadSafeSingleton instance1 = ThreadSafeSingleton.getInstance();\n ThreadSafeSingleton instance2 = ThreadSafeSingleton.getInstance();\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateDoubleCheckedLockingSingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"4. \u53cc\u91cd\u68c0\u67e5\u9501\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff1a\");\n DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton instance1 = DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton.getInstance();\n DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton instance2 = DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton.getInstance();\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateStaticInnerClassSingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"5. \u9759\u6001\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff1a\");\n StaticInnerClassSingleton instance1 = StaticInnerClassSingleton.getInstance();\n StaticInnerClassSingleton instance2 = StaticInnerClassSingleton.getInstance();\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n private static void demonstrateEnumSingleton() {\n System.out.println(\"6. \u679a\u4e3e\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\uff1a\");\n EnumSingleton instance1 = EnumSingleton.INSTANCE;\n EnumSingleton instance2 = EnumSingleton.INSTANCE;\n \n System.out.println(\"Instance1: \" + instance1);\n System.out.println(\"Instance2: \" + instance2);\n System.out.println(\"Same instance? \" + (instance1 == instance2));\n instance1.doSomething();\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u591a\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u6027\u6d4b\u8bd5\n */\n private static void testThreadSafety() {\n int threadCount = 10;\n ExecutorService executor = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(threadCount);\n \n System.out.println(\"\u6d4b\u8bd5\u53cc\u91cd\u68c0\u67e5\u9501\u5355\u4f8b\u7684\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u6027\uff1a\");\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u53cc\u91cd\u68c0\u67e5\u9501\u5355\u4f8b\n for (int i = 0; i < threadCount; i++) {\n final int threadId = i;\n executor.submit(() -> {\n DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton instance = DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton.getInstance();\n System.out.println(\"Thread \" + threadId + \" got instance: \" + instance.hashCode());\n });\n }\n \n executor.shutdown();\n try {\n executor.awaitTermination(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS);\n } catch (InterruptedException e) {\n Thread.currentThread().interrupt();\n }\n \n System.out.println(\"\\n\u6d4b\u8bd5\u9759\u6001\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\u5355\u4f8b\u7684\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u6027\uff1a\");\n ExecutorService executor2 = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(threadCount);\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u9759\u6001\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\u5355\u4f8b\n for (int i = 0; i < threadCount; i++) {\n final int threadId = i;\n executor2.submit(() -> {\n StaticInnerClassSingleton instance = StaticInnerClassSingleton.getInstance();\n System.out.println(\"Thread \" + threadId + \" got instance: \" + instance.hashCode());\n });\n }\n \n executor2.shutdown();\n try {\n executor2.awaitTermination(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS);\n } catch (InterruptedException e) {\n Thread.currentThread().interrupt();\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"现在创建一个演示类来展示各种单例模式的使用：

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/designpatterns/singleton/README.md", "file_content": "# \u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f (Singleton Pattern)\n\n## \u6982\u8ff0\n\u5355\u4f8b\u6a21\u5f0f\u786e\u4fdd\u4e00\u4e2a\u7c7b\u53ea\u6709\u4e00\u4e2a\u5b9e\u4f8b\uff0c\u5e76\u63d0\u4f9b\u5168\u5c40\u8bbf\u95ee\u70b9\u3002\u8fd9\u662f\u6700\u5e38\u7528\u7684\u8bbe\u8ba1\u6a21\u5f0f\u4e4b\u4e00\u3002\n\n## \u5b9e\u73b0\u65b9\u5f0f\u5bf9\u6bd4\n\n### 1. \u997f\u6c49\u5f0f (EagerSingleton)\n```java\nprivate static final EagerSingleton INSTANCE = new EagerSingleton();\n```\n- \u2705 \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\n- \u2705 \u5b9e\u73b0\u7b80\u5355\n- \u274c \u4e0d\u652f\u6301\u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n- \u274c \u53ef\u80fd\u6d6a\u8d39\u5185\u5b58\n\n**\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a** \u786e\u5b9a\u4f1a\u4f7f\u7528\u8be5\u5b9e\u4f8b\uff0c\u4e14\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u4e0d\u8017\u65f6\n\n### 2. \u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f (LazySingleton)\n```java\npublic static LazySingleton getInstance() {\n if (instance == null) {\n instance = new LazySingleton();\n }\n return instance;\n}\n```\n- \u2705 \u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n- \u274c \u7ebf\u7a0b\u4e0d\u5b89\u5168\n- \u274c \u591a\u7ebf\u7a0b\u73af\u5883\u4e0b\u53ef\u80fd\u521b\u5efa\u591a\u4e2a\u5b9e\u4f8b\n\n**\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a** \u4ec5\u7528\u4e8e\u5355\u7ebf\u7a0b\u73af\u5883\uff08\u4e0d\u63a8\u8350\uff09\n\n### 3. \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u61d2\u6c49\u5f0f (ThreadSafeSingleton)\n```java\npublic static synchronized ThreadSafeSingleton getInstance() {\n if (instance == null) {\n instance = new ThreadSafeSingleton();\n }\n return instance;\n}\n```\n- \u2705 \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\n- \u2705 \u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n- \u274c \u6027\u80fd\u8f83\u5dee\uff08\u6bcf\u6b21\u8c03\u7528\u90fd\u540c\u6b65\uff09\n\n**\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a** \u8c03\u7528\u9891\u7387\u4e0d\u9ad8\u7684\u573a\u666f\n\n### 4. \u53cc\u91cd\u68c0\u67e5\u9501 (DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton) \u2b50\u63a8\u8350\n```java\npublic static DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton getInstance() {\n if (instance == null) {\n synchronized (DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton.class) {\n if (instance == null) {\n instance = new DoubleCheckedLockingSingleton();\n }\n }\n }\n return instance;\n}\n```\n- \u2705 \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\n- \u2705 \u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n- \u2705 \u9ad8\u6027\u80fd\n- \u26a0\ufe0f \u9700\u8981volatile\u5173\u952e\u5b57\n\n**\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a** \u9ad8\u5e76\u53d1\u73af\u5883\uff0c\u9700\u8981\u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n\n### 5. \u9759\u6001\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b (StaticInnerClassSingleton) \u2b50\u63a8\u8350\n```java\nprivate static class SingletonHolder {\n private static final StaticInnerClassSingleton INSTANCE = new StaticInnerClassSingleton();\n}\n```\n- \u2705 \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\n- \u2705 \u5ef6\u8fdf\u52a0\u8f7d\n- \u2705 \u9ad8\u6027\u80fd\n- \u2705 \u5b9e\u73b0\u4f18\u96c5\n\n**\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a** EnumSingleton {\n INSTANCE;\n}\n```\n- \u2705 \u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\n- \u2705 \u9632\u6b62\u53cd\u5c04\u653b\u51fb\n- \u2705 \u9632\u6b62\u5e8f\u5217\u5316\u7834\u574f\n- \u274c ## 组合模式概述

组合模式将对象组合成**树形结构**来表示"部分-整体"的层次结构，使得客户端对单个对象和组合对象的使用具有一致性。

## 核心思想
- **统一接口**：叶子节点和组合节点实现相同接口
- **树形结构**：可以递归地组合对象
- **透明性**：客户端无需区分是单个对象还是组合对象

## 现实世界类比
**文件系统**：
- 文件夹可以包含文件和子文件夹
- 文件是叶子节点，文件夹是组合节点
- 对文件夹的操作（如删除、复制）会递归作用于其内容

## 典型应用场景
- **GUI组件**：窗口包含面板，面板包含按钮等
- **组织架构**：部门包含子部门和员工
- **菜单系统**：菜单包含子菜单和菜单项
- **表达式解析**：复合表达式包含子表达式和操作数

## 基本结构
```java
// 组件接口
interface Component {
 void operation();
}

// 叶子节点
class Leaf implements Component {
 public void operation() { /* 具体操作 */ }
}

// 组合节点
class Composite implements Component {
 private List<Component> children = new ArrayList<>();
 
 public void add(Component component) { children.add(component); }
 public void operation() {
 // 递归调用子组件的操作
 for (Component child : children) {
 child.operation();
 }
 }
}
```

## 优点
✅ **简化客户端代码** - 统一处理单个和组合对象 
✅ **易于扩展** - 容易增加新的组件类型 
✅ **符合开闭原则** - 对扩展开放，对修改关闭

## 缺点
❌ **设计复杂** - 使设计变得更加抽象 
❌ **类型限制** - 难以限制组合中组件的类型

组合模式特别适合处理具有层次结构的数据，让您可以像处理单个对象一样处理整个对象树。

i < depth; i++) {\n indent.append(\" \");\n }\n return indent.toString();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u6307\u5b9a\u540d\u79f0\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\n */\n public FileSystemComponent find(String name) {\n if (this.name.equals(name)) {\n return this;\n }\n return null;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"我来在designpatterns包下实现组合设计模式，参考单例模式的结构和最佳实践。

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/designpatterns/composite/File.java", "file_content": "package org.example.designpatterns.composite;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f - \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9 (Leaf)\n * \n * \u8868\u793a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4e2d\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\uff0c\u662f\u7ec4\u5408\u7ed3\u6784\u4e2d\u7684\u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\n * \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\u6ca1\u6709\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\uff0c\u5b9e\u73b0\u4e86\u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u57fa\u672c\u64cd\u4f5c\n */\npublic class File extends FileSystemComponent {\n \n private String content;\n private String extension;\n \n public File(String name, int size) {\n super(name);\n this.size = size;\n this.content = \"\";\n \n // \u63d0\u53d6\u6587\u4ef6\u6269\u5c55\u540d\n int dotIndex = name.lastIndexOf('.');\n if (dotIndex > 0 && dotIndex < name.length() - 1) {\n this.extension = name.substring(dotIndex + 1).toLowerCase();\n } else {\n this.extension = \"\";\n }\n }\n \n public File(String name, int size, String content) {\n this(name, size);\n this.content = content != null ? content : \"\";\n }\n \n @Override\n public void display(int depth) {\n String indent = getIndent(depth);\n String icon = getFileIcon();\n System.out.println(indent + icon + \" \" + name + \" (\" + size + \" bytes)\");\n \n // \u5982\u679c\u6709\u5185\u5bb9\uff0c\u663e\u793a\u5185\u5bb9\u9884\u89c8\n if (!content.isEmpty()) {\n String preview = content.length() > 50 ? \n content.substring(0, 50) + \"...\" : content;\n System.out.println(indent + \" Content: \" + preview);\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public int getSize() {\n return size;\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getType() {\n return \"File (\" + extension.toUpperCase() + \")\";\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u6587\u4ef6\u6269\u5c55\u540d\u8fd4\u56de\u5bf9\u5e94\u7684\u56fe\u6807\n */\n private String getFileIcon() {\n switch (extension) {\n case \"txt\":\n case \"md\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcc4\";\n case \"java\":\n case \"py\":\n case \"js\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcbb\";\n case \"jpg\":\n case \"png\":\n case \"gif\":\n return \"\ud83d\uddbc\ufe0f\";\n case \"mp3\":\n case \"wav\":\n return \"\ud83c\udfb5\";\n case \"mp4\":\n case \"avi\":\n return \"\ud83c\udfac\";\n case \"pdf\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcd5\";\n case \"zip\":\n case \"rar\":\n return \"\ud83d\udce6\";\n default:\n return \"\ud83d\udcc4\";\n }\n }\n \n // \u6587\u4ef6\u7279\u6709\u7684\u65b9\u6cd5\n public String getContent() {\n return content;\n }\n \n public void setContent(String content) {\n this.content = content != null ? content : \"\";\n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6587\u4ef6\u5927\u5c0f\uff08\u7b80\u5316\u8ba1\u7b97\uff09\n this.size = this.content.length();\n }\n \n public String getExtension() {\n return extension;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8bfb\u53d6\u6587\u4ef6\u5185\u5bb9\n */\n public String read() {\n System.out.println(\"Reading file: \" + name);\n return content;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5199\u5165\u6587\u4ef6\u5185\u5bb9\n */\n public void write(String newContent) {\n System.out.println(\"Writing to file: \" + name);\n setContent(newContent);\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"File{name='\" + name + \"', size=\" + size + \", extension='\" + extension + \"'}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/designpatterns/composite/Directory.java", "file_content": "package org.example.designpatterns.composite;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Iterator;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f - \u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9 (Composite)\n * \n * \u8868\u793a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4e2d\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\uff0c\u53ef\u4ee5\u5305\u542b\u6587\u4ef6\u548c\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9\u53ef\u4ee5\u6709\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\uff0c\u5b9e\u73b0\u4e86\u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u6240\u6709\u64cd\u4f5c\n */\npublic class Directory extends FileSystemComponent {\n \n private List<FileSystemComponent> children;\n private int maxDepth;\n \n public Directory(String name) {\n super(name);\n this.children = new ArrayList<>();\n this.maxDepth = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n }\n \n public Directory(String name, int maxDepth) {\n this(name);\n this.maxDepth = maxDepth;\n }\n \n @Override\n public void display(int depth) {\n String indent = getIndent(depth);\n System.out.println(indent + \"\ud83d\udcc1 \" + name + \"/ (\" + children.size() + \" items, \" + getSize() + \" bytes total)\");\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u663e\u793a\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n if (depth < maxDepth) {\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n child.display(depth + 1);\n }\n } else if (!children.isEmpty()) {\n System.out.println(getIndent(depth + 1) + \"... (\" + children.size() + \" items)\");\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public int getSize() {\n int totalSize = 0;\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n totalSize += child.getSize();\n }\n return totalSize;\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getType() {\n return \"Directory\";\n }\n \n @Override\n public void add(FileSystemComponent component) {\n if (component == null) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Component cannot be null\");\n }\n \n // \u9632\u6b62\u6dfb\u52a0\u81ea\u5df1\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u5faa\u73af\u5f15\u7528\n if (component == this) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Cannot add directory to itself\");\n }\n \n children.add(component);\n System.out.println(\"Added \" + component.getName() + \" to directory \" + this.name);\n }\n \n @Override\n public void remove(FileSystemComponent component) {\n if (children.remove(component)) {\n System.out.println(\"Removed \" + component.getName() + \" from directory \" + this.name);\n } else {\n System.out.println(\"Component \" + component.getName() + \" not found in directory \" + this.name);\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public FileSystemComponent getChild(int index) {\n if (index < 0 || index >= children.size()) {\n throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(\"Index: \" + index + \", Size: \" + children.size());\n }\n return children.get(index);\n }\n \n @Override\n public FileSystemComponent find(String name) {\n // \u9996\u5148\u68c0\u67e5\u81ea\u5df1\n if (this.name.equals(name)) {\n return this;\n }\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u641c\u7d22\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n FileSystemComponent found = child.find(name);\n if (found != null) {\n return found;\n }\n }\n \n return null;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n */\n public List<FileSystemComponent> getChildren() {\n return new ArrayList<>(children); // \u8fd4\u56de\u526f\u672c\uff0c\u9632\u6b62\u5916\u90e8\u4fee\u6539\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u6570\u91cf\n */\n public int getChildCount() {\n return children.size();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u76ee\u5f55\u662f\u5426\u4e3a\u7a7a\n */\n public boolean isEmpty() {\n return children.isEmpty();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6e05\u7a7a\u76ee\u5f55\n */\n public void clear() {\n children.clear();\n System.out.println(\"Cleared directory \" + this.name);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6307\u5b9a\u7c7b\u578b\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\u6570\u91cf\n */\n public int getFileCount(String extension) {\n int count = 0;\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n if (child instanceof File) {\n File file = (File) child;\n if (extension == null || extension.isEmpty() || \n file.getExtension().equalsIgnoreCase(extension)) {\n count++;\n }\n } else if (child instanceof Directory) {\n count += ((Directory) child).getFileCount(extension);\n }\n }\n return count;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u76ee\u5f55\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n public DirectoryStats getStats() {\n return new DirectoryStats(this);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u76ee\u5f55\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\n */\n public static class DirectoryStats {\n private int totalFiles;\n private int totalDirectories;\n private int totalSize;\n private int maxDepth;\n \n public DirectoryStats(Directory directory) {\n calculateStats(directory, 0);\n }\n \n private void calculateStats(Directory directory, int currentDepth) {\n maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, currentDepth);\n \n for (FileSystemComponent child : directory.children) {\n if (child instanceof File) {\n totalFiles++;\n totalSize += child.getSize();\n } else if (child instanceof Directory) {\n totalDirectories++;\n calculateStats((Directory) child, currentDepth + 1);\n }\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return String.format(\"Stats{files=%d, directories=%d, totalSize=%d bytes, maxDepth=%d}\", \n totalFiles, totalDirectories, totalSize, maxDepth);\n }\n \n // Getters\n public int getTotalFiles() { return totalFiles; }\n public int getTotalDirectories() { return totalDirectories; }\n public int getTotalSize() { return totalSize; }\n public int getMaxDepth() { return maxDepth; }\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"Directory{name='\" + name + \"', children=\" + children.size() + \", size=\" + getSize() + \"}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File i < depth; i++) {\n indent.append(\" \");\n }\n return indent.toString();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u6307\u5b9a\u540d\u79f0\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\n */\n public FileSystemComponent find(String name) {\n if (this.name.equals(name)) {\n return this;\n }\n return null;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"我看到您希望将组合模式放在 `G:\workspace\programming-skills\demo1\src\main\java\org\example\demo1\designpatterns\` 目录下。让我重新创建文件到正确的位置。

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/composite/File.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f - \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9 (Leaf)\n * \n * \u8868\u793a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4e2d\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\uff0c\u662f\u7ec4\u5408\u7ed3\u6784\u4e2d\u7684\u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\n * \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\u6ca1\u6709\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\uff0c\u5b9e\u73b0\u4e86\u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u57fa\u672c\u64cd\u4f5c\n */\npublic class File extends FileSystemComponent {\n \n private String content;\n private String extension;\n \n public File(String name, int size) {\n super(name);\n this.size = size;\n this.content = \"\";\n \n // \u63d0\u53d6\u6587\u4ef6\u6269\u5c55\u540d\n int dotIndex = name.lastIndexOf('.');\n if (dotIndex > 0 && dotIndex < name.length() - 1) {\n this.extension = name.substring(dotIndex + 1).toLowerCase();\n } else {\n this.extension = \"\";\n }\n }\n \n public File(String name, int size, String content) {\n this(name, size);\n this.content = content != null ? content : \"\";\n }\n \n @Override\n public void display(int depth) {\n String indent = getIndent(depth);\n String icon = getFileIcon();\n System.out.println(indent + icon + \" \" + name + \" (\" + size + \" bytes)\");\n \n // \u5982\u679c\u6709\u5185\u5bb9\uff0c\u663e\u793a\u5185\u5bb9\u9884\u89c8\n if (!content.isEmpty()) {\n String preview = content.length() > 50 ? \n content.substring(0, 50) + \"...\" : content;\n System.out.println(indent + \" Content: \" + preview);\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public int getSize() {\n return size;\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getType() {\n return \"File (\" + extension.toUpperCase() + \")\";\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u6587\u4ef6\u6269\u5c55\u540d\u8fd4\u56de\u5bf9\u5e94\u7684\u56fe\u6807\n */\n private String getFileIcon() {\n switch (extension) {\n case \"txt\":\n case \"md\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcc4\";\n case \"java\":\n case \"py\":\n case \"js\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcbb\";\n case \"jpg\":\n case \"png\":\n case \"gif\":\n return \"\ud83d\uddbc\ufe0f\";\n case \"mp3\":\n case \"wav\":\n return \"\ud83c\udfb5\";\n case \"mp4\":\n case \"avi\":\n return \"\ud83c\udfac\";\n case \"pdf\":\n return \"\ud83d\udcd5\";\n case \"zip\":\n case \"rar\":\n return \"\ud83d\udce6\";\n default:\n return \"\ud83d\udcc4\";\n }\n }\n \n // \u6587\u4ef6\u7279\u6709\u7684\u65b9\u6cd5\n public String getContent() {\n return content;\n }\n \n public void setContent(String content) {\n this.content = content != null ? content : \"\";\n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6587\u4ef6\u5927\u5c0f\uff08\u7b80\u5316\u8ba1\u7b97\uff09\n this.size = this.content.length();\n }\n \n public String getExtension() {\n return extension;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8bfb\u53d6\u6587\u4ef6\u5185\u5bb9\n */\n public String read() {\n System.out.println(\"Reading file: \" + name);\n return content;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5199\u5165\u6587\u4ef6\u5185\u5bb9\n */\n public void write(String newContent) {\n System.out.println(\"Writing to file: \" + name);\n setContent(newContent);\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"File{name='\" + name + \"', size=\" + size + \", extension='\" + extension + \"'}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/composite/Directory.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f - \u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9 (Composite)\n * \n * \u8868\u793a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u4e2d\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\uff0c\u53ef\u4ee5\u5305\u542b\u6587\u4ef6\u548c\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9\u53ef\u4ee5\u6709\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\uff0c\u5b9e\u73b0\u4e86\u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u6240\u6709\u64cd\u4f5c\n */\npublic class Directory extends FileSystemComponent {\n \n private List<FileSystemComponent> children;\n private int maxDepth;\n \n public Directory(String name) {\n super(name);\n this.children = new ArrayList<>();\n this.maxDepth = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n }\n \n public Directory(String name, int maxDepth) {\n this(name);\n this.maxDepth = maxDepth;\n }\n \n @Override\n public void display(int depth) {\n String indent = getIndent(depth);\n System.out.println(indent + \"\ud83d\udcc1 \" + name + \"/ (\" + children.size() + \" items, \" + getSize() + \" bytes total)\");\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u663e\u793a\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n if (depth < maxDepth) {\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n child.display(depth + 1);\n }\n } else if (!children.isEmpty()) {\n System.out.println(getIndent(depth + 1) + \"... (\" + children.size() + \" items)\");\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public int getSize() {\n int totalSize = 0;\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n totalSize += child.getSize();\n }\n return totalSize;\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getType() {\n return \"Directory\";\n }\n \n @Override\n public void add(FileSystemComponent component) {\n if (component == null) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Component cannot be null\");\n }\n \n // \u9632\u6b62\u6dfb\u52a0\u81ea\u5df1\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u5faa\u73af\u5f15\u7528\n if (component == this) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Cannot add directory to itself\");\n }\n \n children.add(component);\n System.out.println(\"Added \" + component.getName() + \" to directory \" + this.name);\n }\n \n @Override\n public void remove(FileSystemComponent component) {\n if (children.remove(component)) {\n System.out.println(\"Removed \" + component.getName() + \" from directory \" + this.name);\n } else {\n System.out.println(\"Component \" + component.getName() + \" not found in directory \" + this.name);\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public FileSystemComponent getChild(int index) {\n if (index < 0 || index >= children.size()) {\n throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(\"Index: \" + index + \", Size: \" + children.size());\n }\n return children.get(index);\n }\n \n @Override\n public FileSystemComponent find(String name) {\n // \u9996\u5148\u68c0\u67e5\u81ea\u5df1\n if (this.name.equals(name)) {\n return this;\n }\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u641c\u7d22\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n FileSystemComponent found = child.find(name);\n if (found != null) {\n return found;\n }\n }\n \n return null;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n */\n public List<FileSystemComponent> getChildren() {\n return new ArrayList<>(children); // \u8fd4\u56de\u526f\u672c\uff0c\u9632\u6b62\u5916\u90e8\u4fee\u6539\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u6570\u91cf\n */\n public int getChildCount() {\n return children.size();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u76ee\u5f55\u662f\u5426\u4e3a\u7a7a\n */\n public boolean isEmpty() {\n return children.isEmpty();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6e05\u7a7a\u76ee\u5f55\n */\n public void clear() {\n children.clear();\n System.out.println(\"Cleared directory \" + this.name);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6307\u5b9a\u7c7b\u578b\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\u6570\u91cf\n */\n public int getFileCount(String extension) {\n int count = 0;\n for (FileSystemComponent child : children) {\n if (child instanceof File) {\n File file = (File) child;\n if (extension == null || extension.isEmpty() || \n file.getExtension().equalsIgnoreCase(extension)) {\n count++;\n }\n } else if (child instanceof Directory) {\n count += ((Directory) child).getFileCount(extension);\n }\n }\n return count;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u76ee\u5f55\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n public DirectoryStats getStats() {\n return new DirectoryStats(this);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u76ee\u5f55\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\n */\n public static class DirectoryStats {\n private int totalFiles;\n private int totalDirectories;\n private int totalSize;\n private int maxDepth;\n \n public DirectoryStats(Directory directory) {\n calculateStats(directory, 0);\n }\n \n private void calculateStats(Directory directory, int currentDepth) {\n maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, currentDepth);\n \n for (FileSystemComponent child : directory.children) {\n if (child instanceof File) {\n totalFiles++;\n totalSize += child.getSize();\n } else if (child instanceof Directory) {\n totalDirectories++;\n calculateStats((Directory) child, currentDepth + 1);\n }\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return String.format(\"Stats{files=%d, directories=%d, totalSize=%d bytes, maxDepth=%d}\", \n totalFiles, totalDirectories, totalSize, maxDepth);\n }\n \n // Getters\n public int getTotalFiles() { return totalFiles; }\n public int getTotalDirectories() { return totalDirectories; }\n public int getTotalSize() { return totalSize; }\n public int getMaxDepth() { return maxDepth; }\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"Directory{name='\" + name + \"', children=\" + children.size() + \", size=\" + getSize() + \"}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/composite/CompositeDemo.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f\u6f14\u793a\u7c7b\n * \u5c55\u793a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7684\u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f\u5b9e\u73b0\n */\npublic class CompositeDemo {\n \n public static void main(String[] args) {\n System.out.println(\"=== \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f\u6f14\u793a - \u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf ===\\n\");\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u6839\u76ee\u5f55\n Directory root = new Directory(\"root\");\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\n Directory documents = new Directory(\"Documents\");\n Directory pictures = new Directory(\"Pictures\");\n Directory projects = new Directory(\"Projects\");\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u6587\u4ef6\n File readme = new File(\"README.md\", 1024, \"# \u9879\u76ee\u8bf4\u660e\\n\u8fd9\u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u6f14\u793a\u9879\u76ee...\");\n File config = new File(\"config.txt\", 512, \"server.port=8080\\ndb.url=localhost\");\n File photo1 = new File(\"vacation.jpg\", 2048000);\n File photo2 = new File(\"family.png\", 1536000);\n \n // \u6784\u5efa\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7ed3\u6784\n System.out.println(\"=== \u6784\u5efa\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7ed3\u6784 ===\");\n root.add(documents);\n root.add(pictures);\n root.add(projects);\n root.add(readme);\n \n documents.add(config);\n pictures.add(photo1);\n pictures.add(photo2);\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u9879\u76ee\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\n Directory javaProject = new Directory(\"JavaProject\");\n Directory pythonProject = new Directory(\"PythonProject\");\n projects.add(javaProject);\n projects.add(pythonProject);\n \n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u9879\u76ee\u6587\u4ef6\n File mainJava = new File(\"Main.java\", 2048, \"public class Main {\\n public static void main(String[] args) {\\n System.out.println(\\\"Hello World!\\\");\\n }\\n}\");\n File pomXml = new File(\"pom.xml\", 1024, \"<?xml version=\\\"1.0\\\"?>\\n<project>...</project>\");\n File mainPy = new File(\"main.py\", 512, \"def main():\\n print('Hello Python!')\\n\\nif __name__ == '__main__':\\n main()\");\n \n javaProject.add(mainJava);\n javaProject.add(pomXml);\n pythonProject.add(mainPy);\n \n System.out.println();\n \n // 1. \u663e\u793a\u5b8c\u6574\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7ed3\u6784\n System.out.println(\"=== 1. \u5b8c\u6574\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7ed3\u6784 ===\");\n root.display(0);\n System.out.println();\n \n // 2. \u6f14\u793a\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u4f7f\u7528\n System.out.println(\"=== 2. \u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\u6f14\u793a ===\");\n demonstrateUniformInterface(root);\n demonstrateUniformInterface(documents);\n demonstrateUniformInterface(readme);\n System.out.println();\n \n // 3. \u641c\u7d22\u529f\u80fd\u6f14\u793a\n System.out.println(\"=== 3. \u641c\u7d22\u529f\u80fd\u6f14\u793a ===\");\n searchDemo(root);\n System.out.println();\n \n // 4. \u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\u6f14\u793a\n System.out.println(\"=== 4. \u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\u6f14\u793a ===\");\n statisticsDemo(root);\n System.out.println();\n \n // 5. \u52a8\u6001\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a\n System.out.println(\"=== 5. \u52a8\u6001\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a ===\");\n dynamicOperationsDemo(root);\n System.out.println();\n \n // 6. \u6587\u4ef6\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a\n System.out.println(\"=== 6. \u6587\u4ef6\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a ===\");\n fileOperationsDemo(mainJava);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6f14\u793a\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u4f7f\u7528\n * \u5ba2\u6237\u7aef\u4ee3\u7801\u65e0\u9700\u533a\u5206\u662f\u6587\u4ef6\u8fd8\u662f\u76ee\u5f55\n */\n private static void demonstrateUniformInterface(FileSystemComponent component) {\n System.out.println(\"Component: \" + component.getName());\n System.out.println(\" Type: \" + component.getType());\n System.out.println(\" Size: \" + component.getSize() + \" bytes\");\n System.out.println(\" String representation: \" + component.toString());\n System.out.println();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u529f\u80fd\u6f14\u793a\n */\n private static void searchDemo(Directory root) {\n String[] searchNames = {\"README.md\", \"Pictures\", \"Main.java\", \"nonexistent.txt\"};\n \n for (String name : searchNames) {\n FileSystemComponent found = root.find(name);\n if (found != null) {\n System.out.println(\"Found: \" + found.getName() + \" (\" + found.getType() + \")\");\n } else {\n System.out.println(\"Not found: \" + name);\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\u6f14\u793a\n */\n private static void statisticsDemo(Directory root) {\n Directory.DirectoryStats stats = root.getStats();\n System.out.println(\"Root directory statistics: \" + stats);\n \n System.out.println(\"Java files count: \" + root.getFileCount(\"java\"));\n System.out.println(\"Python files count: \" + root.getFileCount(\"py\"));\n System.out.println(\"Image files count: \" + (root.getFileCount(\"jpg\") + root.getFileCount(\"png\")));\n System.out.println(\"All files count: \" + root.getFileCount(null));\n }\n \n /**\n * \u52a8\u6001\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a\n */\n private static void dynamicOperationsDemo(Directory root) {\n // \u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u7684\u4e34\u65f6\u76ee\u5f55\u548c\u6587\u4ef6\n Directory temp = new Directory(\"temp\");\n File tempFile = new File(\"temp.txt\", 256, \"This is a temporary file\");\n \n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u5230\u6839\u76ee\u5f55\n root.add(temp);\n temp.add(tempFile);\n \n System.out.println(\"After adding temp directory:\");\n root.display(0);\n System.out.println();\n \n // \u79fb\u9664\u4e34\u65f6\u76ee\u5f55\n root.remove(temp);\n System.out.println(\"After removing temp directory:\");\n root.display(0);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6587\u4ef6\u64cd\u4f5c\u6f14\u793a\n */\n private static void fileOperationsDemo(File file) {\n System.out.println(\"Original file content:\");\n String content = file.read();\n System.out.println(content);\n System.out.println();\n \n // \u4fee\u6539\u6587\u4ef6\u5185\u5bb9\n String newContent = \"public class Main {\\n public static void main(String[] args) {\\n System.out.println(\\\"Hello Composite Pattern!\\\");\\n }\\n}\";\n file.write(newContent);\n \n System.out.println(\"Modified file content:\");\n System.out.println(file.read());\n System.out.println(\"New file size: \" + file.getSize() + \" bytes\");\n IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/composite/README.md", "file_content": "# \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f (Composite Pattern)\n\n## \u6982\u8ff0\n\u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f\u5c06\u5bf9\u8c61\u7ec4\u5408\u6210\u6811\u5f62\u7ed3\u6784\u6765\u8868\u793a\"\u90e8\u5206-\u6574\u4f53\"\u7684\u5c42\u6b21\u7ed3\u6784\uff0c\u4f7f\u5f97\u5ba2\u6237\u7aef\u5bf9\u5355\u4e2a\u5bf9\u8c61\u548c\u7ec4\u5408\u5bf9\u8c61\u7684\u4f7f\u7528\u5177\u6709\u4e00\u81f4\u6027\u3002\n\n## \u6838\u5fc3\u7ec4\u4ef6\n\n### 1. \u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3 (Component) - FileSystemComponent\n```java\npublic abstract class FileSystemComponent {\n // \u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\uff0c\u5b9a\u4e49\u53f6\u5b50\u548c\u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9\u7684\u5171\u540c\u64cd\u4f5c\n public abstract void display(int depth);\n public abstract int getSize();\n public abstract String getType();\n}\n```\n\n### 2. \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9 (Leaf) - File\n```java\npublic class File extends FileSystemComponent {\n // \u5b9e\u73b0\u5177\u4f53\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\u64cd\u4f5c\n // \u4e0d\u80fd\u5305\u542b\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\n}\n```\n\n### 3. \u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9 (Composite) - Directory\n```java\npublic class Directory extends FileSystemComponent {\n private List<FileSystemComponent> children;\n // \u53ef\u4ee5\u5305\u542b\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\uff08\u6587\u4ef6\u6216\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\uff09\n // \u9012\u5f52\u5904\u7406\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u7684\u64cd\u4f5c\n}\n```\n\n## \u8bbe\u8ba1\u7279\u70b9\n\n### \u2705 \u4f18\u70b9\n- **\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3**\uff1a\u5ba2\u6237\u7aef\u65e0\u9700\u533a\u5206\u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\u548c\u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9\n- **\u9012\u5f52\u7ed3\u6784**\uff1a\u81ea\u7136\u652f\u6301\u6811\u5f62\u7ed3\u6784\u7684\u904d\u5386\u548c\u64cd\u4f5c\n- **\u6613\u4e8e\u6269\u5c55**\uff1a\u53ef\u4ee5\u8f7b\u677e\u6dfb\u52a0\u65b0\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\n- **\u7b26\u5408\u5f00\u95ed\u539f\u5219**\uff1a\u5bf9\u6269\u5c55\u5f00\u653e\uff0c\u5bf9\u4fee\u6539\u5173\u95ed\n\n### \u26a0\ufe0f \u6ce8\u610f\u4e8b\u9879\n- **\u7c7b\u578b\u5b89\u5168**\uff1a\u9700\u8981\u5728\u8fd0\u884c\u65f6\u68c0\u67e5\u7ec4\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\n- **\u8bbe\u8ba1\u590d\u6742\u6027**\uff1a\u589e\u52a0\u4e86\u7cfb\u7edf\u7684\u62bd\u8c61\u5c42\u6b21\n- **\u6027\u80fd\u8003\u8651**\uff1a\u9012\u5f52\u64cd\u4f5c\u53ef\u80fd\u5f71\u54cd\u6027\u80fd\n\n## \u5b9e\u73b0\u4eae\u70b9\n\n### 1. \u5b89\u5168\u6027\u4fdd\u62a4\n```java\n// \u9632\u6b62\u5faa\u73af\u5f15\u7528\nif (component == this) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Cannot add directory to itself\");\n}\n\n// \u9632\u6b62\u7a7a\u6307\u9488\nif (component == null) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Component cannot be null\");\n}\n```\n\n### 2. \u7edf\u8ba1\u529f\u80fd\n```java\npublic DirectoryStats getStats() {\n return new DirectoryStats(this);\n}\n```\n\n### 3. \u641c\u7d22\u529f\u80fd\n```java\npublic FileSystemComponent find(String name) {\n // \u9012\u5f52\u641c\u7d22\u6574\u4e2a\u6811\u7ed3\u6784\n}\n```\n\n### 4. \u7c7b\u578b\u7279\u5316\n```java\n// \u6839\u636e\u6587\u4ef6\u6269\u5c55\u540d\u663e\u793a\u4e0d\u540c\u56fe\u6807\nprivate String getFileIcon() {\n switch (extension) {\n case \"java\": return \"\ud83d\udcbb\";\n case \"jpg\": return \"\ud83d\uddbc\ufe0f\";\n // ...\n }\n}\n```\n\n## \u4f7f\u7528\u573a\u666f\n\n### \u9002\u7528\u60c5\u51b5\n- **\u6811\u5f62\u7ed3\u6784\u6570\u636e**\uff1a\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u3001\u7ec4\u7ec7\u67b6\u6784\u3001\u83dc\u5355\u7cfb\u7edf\n- **\u90e8\u5206-\u6574\u4f53\u5173\u7cfb**\uff1a\u9700\u8981\u7edf\u4e00\u5904\u7406\u5355\u4e2a\u5bf9\u8c61\u548c\u5bf9\u8c61\u96c6\u5408\n- **\u9012\u5f52\u64cd\u4f5c**\uff1a\u9700\u8981\u5bf9\u6574\u4e2a\u7ed3\u6784\u8fdb\u884c\u7edf\u4e00\u64cd\u4f5c\n\n### \u5178\u578b\u5e94\u7528\n- **GUI\u7ec4\u4ef6**\uff1a\u7a97\u53e3\u5305\u542b\u9762\u677f\uff0c\u9762\u677f\u5305\u542b\u6309\u94ae\n- **\u6587\u6863\u7ed3\u6784**\uff1a\u7ae0\u8282\u5305\u542b\u6bb5\u843d\uff0c\u6bb5\u843d\u5305\u542b\u6587\u672c\n- **\u8868\u8fbe\u5f0f\u89e3\u6790**\uff1a\u590d\u5408\u8868\u8fbe\u5f0f\u5305\u542b\u5b50\u8868\u8fbe\u5f0f\n- **\u7ec4\u7ec7\u67b6\u6784**\uff1a\u90e8\u95e8\u5305\u542b\u5b50\u90e8\u95e8\u548c\u5458\u5de5\n\n## \u4e0e\u5176\u4ed6\u6a21\u5f0f\u7684\u5173\u7cfb\n\n- **\u88c5\u9970\u5668\u6a21\u5f0f**\uff1a\u90fd\u4f7f\u7528\u9012\u5f52\u7ec4\u5408\uff0c\u4f46\u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7528\u4e8e\u6dfb\u52a0\u529f\u80fd\n- **\u8fed\u4ee3\u5668\u6a21\u5f0f**\uff1a\u53ef\u4ee5\u7ed3\u5408\u4f7f\u7528\u6765\u904d\u5386\u7ec4\u5408\u7ed3\u6784\n- **\u8bbf\u95ee\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f**\uff1a\u53ef\u4ee5\u7528\u6765\u5bf9\u7ec4\u5408\u7ed3\u6784\u6267\u884c\u64cd\u4f5c\n\n## \u8fd0\u884c\u6f14\u793a\n```bash\ncd demo1\nmvn compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=\"org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite.CompositeDemo\"\n```\n\n## \u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\n\n1. **\u660e\u786e\u804c\u8d23**\uff1a\u7ec4\u4ef6\u63a5\u53e3\u5e94\u8be5\u53ea\u5305\u542b\u53f6\u5b50\u548c\u7ec4\u5408\u8282\u70b9\u7684\u5171\u540c\u64cd\u4f5c\n2. **\u5f02\u5e38\u5904\u7406**\uff1a\u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\u5bf9\u4e0d\u652f\u6301\u7684\u64cd\u4f5c\u5e94\u629b\u51fa\u5f02\u5e38\n3. **\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316**\uff1a\u5bf9\u4e8e\u5927\u578b\u6811\u7ed3\u6784\uff0c\u8003\u8651\u7f13\u5b58\u8ba1\u7b97\u7ed3\u679c\n4. **\u7c7b\u578b\u5b89\u5168**\uff1a\u5728\u9700\u8981\u65f6\u8fdb\u884c\u7c7b\u578b\u68c0\u67e5\u548c\u8f6c\u6362\n5. **\u9632\u5fa1\u7f16\u7a0b**\uff1a\u9632\u6b62\u5faa\u73af\u5f15\u7528\u548c\u7a7a\u6307\u9488\u5f02\u5e38\n\n## \u6269\u5c55\u5efa\u8bae\n\n- \u6dfb\u52a0\u8bbf\u95ee\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f\u652f\u6301\u66f4\u590d\u6742\u7684\u64cd\u4f5c\n- \u5b9e\u73b0\u8fed\u4ee3\u5668\u6a21\u5f0f\u652f\u6301\u4e0d\u540c\u7684\u904d\u5386\u65b9\u5f0f\n- \u6dfb\u52a0\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f\u652f\u6301\u7ed3\u6784\u53d8\u5316\u901a\u77e5\n- "demo1/src/test/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/composite/CompositeTest.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite;\n\nimport org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;\nimport org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;\nimport static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*;\n\n/**\n * \u7ec4\u5408\u6a21\u5f0f\u6d4b\u8bd5\u7c7b\n */\npublic class CompositeTest {\n \n private Directory root;\n private Directory documents;\n private File readme;\n private File config;\n \n @BeforeEach\n public void setUp() {\n // \u521b\u5efa\u6d4b\u8bd5\u7528\u7684\u6587\u4ef6\u7cfb\u7edf\u7ed3\u6784\n root = new Directory(\"root\");\n documents = new Directory(\"Documents\");\n readme = new File(\"README.md\", 1024, \"# Test Project\");\n config = new File(\"config.txt\", 512, \"port=8080\");\n \n root.add(documents);\n root.add(readme);\n documents.add(config);\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testFileBasicOperations() {\n assertEquals(\"README.md\", readme.getName());\n assertEquals(1024, readme.getSize());\n assertEquals(\"File (MD)\", readme.getType());\n assertEquals(\"md\", readme.getExtension());\n assertEquals(\"# Test Project\", readme.getContent());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testFileContentOperations() {\n String newContent = \"# Updated Project\";\n readme.write(newContent);\n \n assertEquals(newContent, readme.read());\n assertEquals(newContent.length(), readme.getSize());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testDirectoryBasicOperations() {\n assertEquals(\"root\", root.getName());\n assertEquals(\"Directory\", root.getType());\n assertEquals(2, root.getChildCount());\n assertFalse(root.isEmpty());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testDirectorySize() {\n // root\u5305\u542bdocuments\u76ee\u5f55\u548creadme\u6587\u4ef6\n // documents\u5305\u542bconfig\u6587\u4ef6\n // \u603b\u5927\u5c0f\u5e94\u8be5\u662freadme(1024) + config(512) = 1536\n assertEquals(1536, root.getSize());\n assertEquals(512, documents.getSize());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testAddAndRemoveComponents() {\n File newFile = new File(\"test.txt\", 256, \"test content\");\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u6dfb\u52a0\n documents.add(newFile);\n assertEquals(2, documents.getChildCount());\n assertEquals(768, documents.getSize()); // 512 + 256\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u79fb\u9664\n documents.remove(newFile);\n assertEquals(1, documents.getChildCount());\n assertEquals(512, documents.getSize());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testGetChild() {\n FileSystemComponent child = root.getChild(0);\n assertEquals(\"Documents\", child.getName());\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u7d22\u5f15\u8d8a\u754c\n assertThrows(IndexOutOfBoundsException.class, () -> {\n root.getChild(10);\n });\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testFindComponent() {\n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u627e\u5230\u7ec4\u4ef6\n FileSystemComponent found = root.find(\"README.md\");\n assertNotNull(found);\n assertEquals(\"README.md\", found.getName());\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u9012\u5f52\u67e5\u627e\n FileSystemComponent configFound = root.find(\"config.txt\");\n assertNotNull(configFound);\n assertEquals(\"config.txt\", configFound.getName());\n \n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u627e\u4e0d\u5230\u7684\u60c5\u51b5\n FileSystemComponent notFound = root.find(\"nonexistent.txt\");\n assertNull(notFound);\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testFileCountByExtension() {\n File javaFile = new File(\"Main.java\", 1024);\n File pythonFile = new File(\"script.py\", 512);\n \n documents.add(javaFile);\n documents.add(pythonFile);\n \n assertEquals(1, root.getFileCount(\"java\"));\n assertEquals(1, root.getFileCount(\"py\"));\n assertEquals(1, root.getFileCount(\"md\"));\n assertEquals(1, root.getFileCount(\"txt\"));\n assertEquals(4, root.getFileCount(null)); // \u6240\u6709\u6587\u4ef6\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testDirectoryStats() {\n File javaFile = new File(\"Main.java\", 2048);\n Directory subDir = new Directory(\"SubDir\");\n File subFile = new File(\"sub.txt\", 256);\n \n documents.add(javaFile);\n documents.add(subDir);\n subDir.add(subFile);\n \n Directory.DirectoryStats stats = root.getStats();\n assertEquals(4, stats.getTotalFiles()); // readme, config, javaFile, subFile\n assertEquals(2, stats.getTotalDirectories()); // documents, subDir\n assertEquals(3840, stats.getTotalSize()); // 1024+512+2048+256\n assertEquals(2, stats.getMaxDepth()); // root->documents->subDir\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testClearDirectory() {\n assertFalse(documents.isEmpty());\n documents.clear();\n assertTrue(documents.isEmpty());\n assertEquals(0, documents.getChildCount());\n assertEquals(0, documents.getSize());\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testLeafNodeOperations() {\n // \u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\u4e0d\u652f\u6301\u7ec4\u5408\u64cd\u4f5c\n assertThrows(UnsupportedOperationException.class, () -> {\n readme.add(new File(\"test.txt\", 100));\n });\n \n assertThrows(UnsupportedOperationException.class, () -> {\n readme.remove(config);\n });\n \n assertThrows(UnsupportedOperationException.class, () -> {\n readme.getChild(0);\n });\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testSelfAdditionPrevention() {\n // \u9632\u6b62\u76ee\u5f55\u6dfb\u52a0\u81ea\u5df1\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u5faa\u73af\u5f15\u7528\n assertThrows(IllegalArgumentException.class, () -> {\n root.add(root);\n });\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testNullComponentAddition() {\n // \u9632\u6b62\u6dfb\u52a0null\u7ec4\u4ef6\n assertThrows(IllegalArgumentException.class, () -> {\n root.add(null);\n });\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testUniformInterface() {\n // \u6d4b\u8bd5\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3 - \u5ba2\u6237\u7aef\u4ee3\u7801\u65e0\u9700\u533a\u5206\u6587\u4ef6\u548c\u76ee\u5f55\n FileSystemComponent[] components = {root, documents, readme, config};\n \n for (FileSystemComponent component : components) {\n assertNotNull(component.getName());\n assertNotNull(component.getType());\n assertTrue(component.getSize() >= 0);\n assertNotNull(component.toString());\n \n // find\u65b9\u6cd5\u5bf9\u6240\u6709\u7ec4\u4ef6\u90fd\u53ef\u7528\n FileSystemComponent self = component.find(component.getName());\n assertEquals(component, self);\n }\n }\n \n @Test\n public void testFileExtensionHandling() {\n File noExtension = new File(\"README\", 100);\n File multiDot = new File(\"archive.tar.gz\", 200);\n File hiddenFile = new File(\".gitignore\", 50);\n \n ","workspace_file_chunks":[]},{"status":"success","request_id":"6601506a-ae96-4c0e-88f5-405008f03e46","request_message":"","structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":0,"content":"## 总结

我已经成功在 `demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/` 目录下实现了组合设计模式，参考了单例模式的结构和最佳实践。

### 实现的组合模式特点：

#### 1. **核心组件**
- **FileSystemComponent** - 抽象组件，定义统一接口
- **File** - 叶子节点，表示文件
- **Directory** - 组合节点，表示目录

#### 2. **设计亮点**
- ✅ **统一接口**：客户端无需区分文件和目录
- ✅ **递归结构**：支持任意深度的树形结构
- ✅ **安全防护**：防止循环引用和空指针异常
- ✅ **功能丰富**：搜索、统计、动态操作等
- ✅ **类型特化**：根据文件扩展名显示不同图标

#### 3. **最佳实践**
- **异常处理**：叶子节点对不支持的操作抛出异常
- **防御编程**：参数验证和边界检查
- **性能优化**：返回集合副本防止外部修改
- **扩展性**：易于添加新的组件类型

#### 4. **测试验证**
- ✅ **15个单元测试全部通过**
- ✅ **演示程序运行成功**
- ✅ **功能完整性验证**

### 运行方式：

```bash
# 编译项目
mvn compile

# 运行演示
java -cp target/classes org.example.demo1.designpatterns.composite.CompositeDemo

# 运行测试
mvn test -Dtest=CompositeTest
```

这个实现展示了组合模式的核心思想：**将对象组合成树形结构来表示"部分-整体"的层次结构，使得客户端对单个对象和组合对象的使用具有一致性**。通过文件系统这个直观的例子，很好地演示了组合模式在实际应用中的价值。

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/observer/Observer.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.observer;\n\n/**\n * \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f - \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u63a5\u53e3 (Observer)\n * \n * \u5b9a\u4e49\u4e86\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7684\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\uff0c\u5f53\u88ab\u89c2\u5bdf\u7684\u4e3b\u9898\u72b6\u6001\u53d1\u751f\u53d8\u5316\u65f6\uff0c\n * \u6240\u6709\u6ce8\u518c\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u90fd\u4f1a\u6536\u5230\u901a\u77e5\u5e76\u6267\u884c\u76f8\u5e94\u7684\u66f4\u65b0\u64cd\u4f5c\u3002\n */\npublic interface Observer {\n \n /**\n * \u66f4\u65b0\u65b9\u6cd5\uff0c\u5f53\u4e3b\u9898\u72b6\u6001\u53d1\u751f\u53d8\u5316\u65f6\u88ab\u8c03\u7528\n * \n * @param subject \u53d1\u751f\u53d8\u5316\u7684\u4e3b\u9898\u5bf9\u8c61\n * @param event \u4e8b\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\u6216\u53d8\u5316\u4fe1\u606f\n * @param data \u76f8\u5173\u6570\u636e\uff0c\u53ef\u4ee5\u4e3anull\n */\n void update(Subject subject, String event, Object data);\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7684\u540d\u79f0\u6216\u6807\u8bc6\n * \n * @return \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u540d\u79f0\n */\n String getName();\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u662f\u5426\u5bf9\u7279\u5b9a\u4e8b\u4ef6\u611f\u5174\u8da3\n * \u9ed8\u8ba4\u5b9e\u73b0\u8fd4\u56detrue\uff0c\u8868\u793a\u5bf9\u6240\u6709\u4e8b\u4ef6\u90fd\u611f\u5174\u8da3\n * \n * @param event \u4e8b\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\n * @return \u5982\u679c\u611f\u5174\u8da3\u8fd4\u56detrue\uff0c\u5426\u5219\u8fd4\u56defalse\n */\n default boolean isInterestedIn(String event) {\n return true;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"我来在designpatterns包下实现观察者模式，参考之前的结构和最佳实践。

\u4e3b\u9898\u63a5\u53e3 (Subject)\n * \n * \u5b9a\u4e49\u4e86\u88ab\u89c2\u5bdf\u4e3b\u9898\u7684\u7edf\u4e00\u63a5\u53e3\uff0c\u63d0\u4f9b\u6ce8\u518c\u3001\u79fb\u9664\u548c\u901a\u77e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7684\u65b9\u6cd5\u3002\n * \u4e3b\u9898\u7ef4\u62a4\u4e00\u4e2a\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u5217\u8868\uff0c\u5f53\u72b6\u6001\u53d1\u751f\u53d8\u5316\u65f6\u901a\u77e5\u6240\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u3002\n */\npublic interface Subject {\n \n /**\n * \u6ce8\u518c\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * \n * @param observer \u8981\u6ce8\u518c\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * @return \u5982\u679c\u6ce8\u518c\u6210\u529f\u8fd4\u56detrue\uff0c\u5982\u679c\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\u8fd4\u56defalse\n */\n boolean registerObserver(Observer observer);\n \n /**\n * \u79fb\u9664\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * \n * @param observer \u8981\u79fb\u9664\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * @return \u5982\u679c\u79fb\u9664\u6210\u529f\u8fd4\u56detrue\uff0c\u5982\u679c\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\u8fd4\u56defalse\n */\n boolean removeObserver(Observer observer);\n \n /**\n * \u901a\u77e5\u6240\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * \n * @param event \u4e8b\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\n * @param data \u76f8\u5173\u6570\u636e\n */\n void notifyObservers(String event, Object data);\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u5f53\u524d\u6ce8\u518c\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6570\u91cf\n * \n * @return \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6570\u91cf\n */\n int getObserverCount();\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6ce8\u518c\n * \n * @return \u5982\u679c\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u8fd4\u56detrue\uff0c\u5426\u5219\u8fd4\u56defalse\n */\n default boolean hasObservers() {\n return getObserverCount() > 0;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/observer/AbstractSubject.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.observer;\n\nimport java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;\n\n/**\n * \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f - \u62bd\u8c61\u4e3b\u9898\u7c7b (Abstract Subject)\n * \n * \u63d0\u4f9b\u4e86\u4e3b\u9898\u63a5\u53e3\u7684\u9ed8\u8ba4\u5b9e\u73b0\uff0c\u5305\u62ec\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7684\u7ba1\u7406\u548c\u901a\u77e5\u673a\u5236\u3002\n * \u4f7f\u7528\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\u7684\u96c6\u5408\u548c\u8bfb\u5199\u9501\u6765\u652f\u6301\u591a\u7ebf\u7a0b\u73af\u5883\u3002\n */\npublic abstract class AbstractSubject implements Subject {\n \n // \u4f7f\u7528CopyOnWriteArrayList\u4fdd\u8bc1\u7ebf\u7a0b\u5b89\u5168\uff0c\u9002\u5408\u8bfb\u591a\u5199\u5c11\u7684\u573a\u666f\n private final List<Observer> observers = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();\n \n // \u8bfb\u5199\u9501\uff0c\u7528\u4e8e\u4fdd\u62a4\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u5217\u8868\u7684\u5e76\u53d1\u8bbf\u95ee\n private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();\n private final ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock readLock = lock.readLock();\n private final ReentrantReadWriteLock.WriteLock writeLock = lock.writeLock();\n \n @Override\n public boolean registerObserver(Observer observer) {\n if (observer == null) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Observer cannot be null\");\n }\n \n writeLock.lock();\n try {\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\n if (observers.contains(observer)) {\n System.out.println(\"Observer \" + observer.getName() + \" is already registered\");\n return false;\n }\n \n boolean added = observers.add(observer);\n if (added) {\n System.out.println(\"Observer \" + observer.getName() + \" registered successfully\");\n onObserverRegistered(observer);\n }\n return added;\n } finally {\n writeLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public boolean removeObserver(Observer observer) {\n if (observer == null) {\n return false;\n }\n \n writeLock.lock();\n try {\n boolean removed = observers.remove(observer);\n if (removed) {\n System.out.println(\"Observer \" + observer.getName() + \" removed successfully\");\n onObserverRemoved(observer);\n } else {\n System.out.println(\"Observer \" + observer.getName() + \" not found\");\n }\n return removed;\n } finally {\n writeLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public void notifyObservers(String event, Object data) {\n if (event == null) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Event cannot be null\");\n }\n \n readLock.lock();\n try {\n if (observers.isEmpty()) {\n System.out.println(\"No observers to notify for event: \" + event);\n return;\n }\n \n System.out.println(\"Notifying \" + observers.size() + \" observers about event: \" + event);\n \n // \u901a\u77e5\u6240\u6709\u611f\u5174\u8da3\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n for (Observer observer : observers) {\n try {\n if (observer.isInterestedIn(event)) {\n observer.update(this, event, data);\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n // \u6355\u83b7\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u66f4\u65b0\u65f6\u7684\u5f02\u5e38\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u5f71\u54cd\u5176\u4ed6\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n System.err.println(\"Error notifying observer \" + observer.getName() + \": \" + e.getMessage());\n onObserverError(observer, e);\n }\n }\n } finally {\n readLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public int getObserverCount() {\n readLock.lock();\n try {\n return observers.size();\n } finally {\n readLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7684\u526f\u672c\uff08\u9632\u6b62\u5916\u90e8\u4fee\u6539\uff09\n * \n * @return \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u5217\u8868\u7684\u526f\u672c\n */\n protected List<Observer> getObservers() {\n readLock.lock();\n try {\n return List.copyOf(observers);\n } finally {\n readLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6e05\u9664\u6240\u6709\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n */\n public void clearObservers() {\n writeLock.lock();\n try {\n int count = observers.size();\n observers.clear();\n System.out.println(\"Cleared \" + count + \" observers\");\n } finally {\n writeLock.unlock();\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5f53\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6ce8\u518c\u65f6\u7684\u56de\u8c03\u65b9\u6cd5\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n * \n * @param observer \u6ce8\u518c\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n */\n protected void onObserverRegistered(Observer observer) {\n // \u9ed8\u8ba4\u7a7a\u5b9e\u73b0\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5f53\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u79fb\u9664\u65f6\u7684\u56de\u8c03\u65b9\u6cd5\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n * \n * @param observer \u79fb\u9664\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n */\n protected void onObserverRemoved(Observer observer) {\n // \u9ed8\u8ba4\u7a7a\u5b9e\u73b0\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5f53\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u66f4\u65b0\u65f6\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\u7684\u56de\u8c03\u65b9\u6cd5\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n * \n * @param observer \u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\u7684\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\n * @param error \u9519\u8bef\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n protected void onObserverError(Observer observer, Exception error) {\n // \u9ed8\u8ba4\u7a7a\u5b9e\u73b0\uff0c\u5b50\u7c7b\u53ef\u4ee5\u91cd\u5199\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/observer/WeatherStation.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.observer;\n\n/**\n * \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f - \u5177\u4f53\u4e3b\u9898\u7c7b (Concrete Subject)\n * \n * \u5929\u6c14\u7ad9\u7c7b\uff0c\u4f5c\u4e3a\u88ab\u89c2\u5bdf\u7684\u4e3b\u9898\uff0c\u7ef4\u62a4\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u5e76\u5728\u6570\u636e\u53d8\u5316\u65f6\u901a\u77e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u3002\n * \u8fd9\u662f\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f\u7684\u7ecf\u5178\u5e94\u7528\u573a\u666f\u3002\n */\npublic class WeatherStation extends AbstractSubject {\n \n // \u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\n private float temperature; // \u6e29\u5ea6\uff08\u6444\u6c0f\u5ea6\uff09\n private float humidity; // \u6e7f\u5ea6\uff08\u767e\u5206\u6bd4\uff09\n private float pressure; // \u6c14\u538b\uff08\u767e\u5e15\uff09\n private String weatherCondition; // \u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n private String location; // \u4f4d\u7f6e\n \n // \u4e8b\u4ef6\u7c7b\u578b\u5e38\u91cf\n public static final String EVENT_TEMPERATURE_CHANGED = \"TEMPERATURE_CHANGED\";\n public static final String EVENT_HUMIDITY_CHANGED = \"HUMIDITY_CHANGED\";\n public static final String EVENT_PRESSURE_CHANGED = \"PRESSURE_CHANGED\";\n public static final String EVENT_WEATHER_CHANGED = \"WEATHER_CHANGED\";\n public static final String EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED = \"MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED\";\n public static final String EVENT_EXTREME_WEATHER = \"EXTREME_WEATHER\";\n \n public WeatherStation(String location) {\n this.location = location;\n this.temperature = 0.0f;\n this.humidity = 0.0f;\n this.pressure = 1013.25f; // \u6807\u51c6\u5927\u6c14\u538b\n this.weatherCondition = \"Unknown\";\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8bbe\u7f6e\u5929\u6c14\u6d4b\u91cf\u6570\u636e\n * \n * @param temperature \u6e29\u5ea6\n * @param humidity \u6e7f\u5ea6\n * @param pressure \u6c14\u538b\n */\n public void setMeasurements(float temperature, float humidity, float pressure) {\n boolean temperatureChanged = Math.abs(this.temperature - temperature) > 0.1f;\n boolean humidityChanged = Math.abs(this.humidity - humidity) > 1.0f;\n boolean pressureChanged = Math.abs(this.pressure - pressure) > 1.0f;\n \n this.temperature = temperature;\n this.humidity = humidity;\n this.pressure = pressure;\n \n // \u6839\u636e\u6570\u636e\u66f4\u65b0\u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n updateWeatherCondition();\n \n // \u901a\u77e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u5177\u4f53\u7684\u53d8\u5316\n if (temperatureChanged) {\n notifyObservers(EVENT_TEMPERATURE_CHANGED, temperature);\n }\n if (humidityChanged) {\n notifyObservers(EVENT_HUMIDITY_CHANGED, humidity);\n }\n if (pressureChanged) {\n notifyObservers(EVENT_PRESSURE_CHANGED, pressure);\n }\n \n // \u901a\u77e5\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6574\u4f53\u6d4b\u91cf\u6570\u636e\u53d8\u5316\n notifyObservers(EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED, createWeatherData());\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u6781\u7aef\u5929\u6c14\n checkExtremeWeather();\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8bbe\u7f6e\u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n * \n * @param condition \u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n */\n public void setWeatherCondition(String condition) {\n if (!this.weatherCondition.equals(condition)) {\n this.weatherCondition = condition;\n notifyObservers(EVENT_WEATHER_CHANGED, condition);\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u6d4b\u91cf\u6570\u636e\u81ea\u52a8\u66f4\u65b0\u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n */\n private void updateWeatherCondition() {\n String newCondition;\n \n if (temperature > 35) {\n newCondition = \"Hot\";\n } else if (temperature < 0) {\n newCondition = \"Freezing\";\n } else if (humidity > 80 && temperature > 20) {\n newCondition = \"Humid\";\n } else if (humidity < 30) {\n newCondition = \"Dry\";\n } else if (pressure < 1000) {\n newCondition = \"Stormy\";\n } else if (pressure > 1020) {\n newCondition = \"Clear\";\n } else {\n newCondition = \"Mild\";\n }\n \n setWeatherCondition(newCondition);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u6781\u7aef\u5929\u6c14\u6761\u4ef6\n */\n private void checkExtremeWeather() {\n if (temperature > 40 || temperature < -20 || \n humidity > 95 || pressure < 980 || pressure > 1040) {\n \n ExtremeWeatherData extremeData = new ExtremeWeatherData(\n temperature, humidity, pressure, weatherCondition\n );\n notifyObservers(EVENT_EXTREME_WEATHER, extremeData);\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u521b\u5efa\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u5bf9\u8c61\n * \n * @return \u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\n */\n private WeatherData createWeatherData() {\n return new WeatherData(temperature, humidity, pressure, weatherCondition, location);\n }\n \n // Getters\n public float getTemperature() { return temperature; }\n public float getHumidity() { return humidity; }\n public float getPressure() { return pressure; }\n public String getWeatherCondition() { return weatherCondition; }\n public String getLocation() { return location; }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\n * \n * @return \u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u5bf9\u8c61\n */\n public WeatherData getCurrentWeatherData() {\n return createWeatherData();\n }\n \n @Override\n protected void onObserverRegistered(Observer observer) {\n // \u65b0\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6ce8\u518c\u65f6\uff0c\u53d1\u9001\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\n observer.update(this, EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED, createWeatherData());\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return String.format(\"WeatherStation{location='%s', temp=%.1f\u00b0C, humidity=%.1f%%, pressure=%.1fhPa, condition='%s'}\", \n location, temperature, humidity, pressure, weatherCondition);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\n */\n public static class WeatherData {\n private final float temperature;\n private final float humidity;\n private final float pressure;\n private final String condition;\n private final String location;\n private final long timestamp;\n \n public WeatherData(float temperature, float humidity, float pressure, String condition, String location) {\n this.temperature = temperature;\n this.humidity = humidity;\n this.pressure = pressure;\n this.condition = condition;\n this.location = location;\n this.timestamp = System.currentTimeMillis();\n }\n \n // Getters\n public float getTemperature() { return temperature; }\n public float getHumidity() { return humidity; }\n public float getPressure() { return pressure; }\n public String getCondition() { return condition; }\n public String getLocation() { return location; }\n public long getTimestamp() { return timestamp; }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return String.format(\"WeatherData{location='%s', temp=%.1f\u00b0C, humidity=%.1f%%, pressure=%.1fhPa, condition='%s'}\", \n location, temperature, humidity, pressure, condition);\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6781\u7aef\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u5185\u90e8\u7c7b\n */\n public static class ExtremeWeatherData extends WeatherData {\n private final String alertMessage;\n \n public ExtremeWeatherData(float temperature, float humidity, float pressure, String condition) {\n super(temperature, humidity, pressure, condition, \"\");\n this.alertMessage = generateAlertMessage();\n }\n \n private String generateAlertMessage() {\n StringBuilder alert = new StringBuilder(\"EXTREME WEATHER ALERT: \");\n \n if (getTemperature() > 40) alert.append(\"Extreme Heat! \");\n if (getTemperature() < -20) alert.append(\"Extreme Cold! \");\n if (getHumidity() > 95) alert.append(\"Extreme Humidity! \");\n if (getPressure() < 980) alert.append(\"Very Low Pressure! \");\n if (getPressure() > 1040) alert.append(\"Very High Pressure! \");\n \n return alert.toString();\n }\n \n public String getAlertMessage() { return alertMessage; }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/observer/WeatherDisplay.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.observer;\n\nimport java.text.SimpleDateFormat;\nimport java.util.Date;\n\n/**\n * \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f - \u5177\u4f53\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7c7b (Concrete Observer)\n * \n * \u5929\u6c14\u663e\u793a\u5668\u7c7b\uff0c\u5b9e\u73b0\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u63a5\u53e3\uff0c\u7528\u4e8e\u663e\u793a\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u4fe1\u606f\u3002\n * \u8fd9\u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u57fa\u7840\u7684\u5929\u6c14\u663e\u793a\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u3002\n */\npublic class WeatherDisplay implements Observer {\n \n private final String name;\n private WeatherStation.WeatherData currentWeatherData;\n private final SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\");\n \n public WeatherDisplay(String name) {\n this.name = name;\n }\n \n @Override\n public void update(Subject subject, String event, Object data) {\n System.out.println(\"\\n=== \" + name + \" Update ===\");\n System.out.println(\"Event: \" + event);\n System.out.println(\"Time: \" + dateFormat.format(new Date()));\n \n if (subject instanceof WeatherStation) {\n WeatherStation station = (WeatherStation) subject;\n \n switch (event) {\n case WeatherStation.EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED:\n if (data instanceof WeatherStation.WeatherData) {\n this.currentWeatherData = (WeatherStation.WeatherData) data;\n displayCurrentConditions();\n }\n break;\n \n case WeatherStation.EVENT_TEMPERATURE_CHANGED:\n System.out.println(\"\ud83c\udf21\ufe0f Temperature updated: \" + data + \"\u00b0C\");\n break;\n \n case WeatherStation.EVENT_HUMIDITY_CHANGED:\n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udca7 Humidity updated: \" + data + \"%\");\n break;\n \n case WeatherStation.EVENT_PRESSURE_CHANGED:\n System.out.println(\"\ud83c\udf2a\ufe0f Pressure updated: \" + data + \" hPa\");\n break;\n \n case WeatherStation.EVENT_WEATHER_CHANGED:\n System.out.println(\"\ud83c\udf24\ufe0f Weather condition changed to: \" + data);\n break;\n \n case WeatherStation.EVENT_EXTREME_WEATHER:\n if (data instanceof WeatherStation.ExtremeWeatherData) {\n displayExtremeWeatherAlert((WeatherStation.ExtremeWeatherData) data);\n }\n break;\n \n default:\n System.out.println(\"Unknown event received: \" + event);\n break;\n }\n }\n \n System.out.println(\"=== End \" + name + \" Update ===\\n\");\n }\n \n /**\n * \u663e\u793a\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u72b6\u51b5\n */\n private void displayCurrentConditions() {\n if (currentWeatherData == null) {\n System.out.println(\"No weather data available\");\n return;\n }\n \n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udcca Current Weather Conditions:\");\n System.out.println(\" Location: \" + currentWeatherData.getLocation());\n System.out.println(\" Temperature: \" + currentWeatherData.getTemperature() + \"\u00b0C\");\n System.out.println(\" Humidity: \" + currentWeatherData.getHumidity() + \"%\");\n System.out.println(\" Pressure: \" + currentWeatherData.getPressure() + \" hPa\");\n System.out.println(\" Condition: \" + currentWeatherData.getCondition());\n System.out.println(\" Comfort Level: \" + getComfortLevel());\n }\n \n /**\n * \u663e\u793a\u6781\u7aef\u5929\u6c14\u8b66\u62a5\n */\n private void displayExtremeWeatherAlert(WeatherStation.ExtremeWeatherData extremeData) {\n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udea8 \" + extremeData.getAlertMessage());\n System.out.println(\" Temperature: \" + extremeData.getTemperature() + \"\u00b0C\");\n System.out.println(\" Humidity: \" + extremeData.getHumidity() + \"%\");\n System.out.println(\" Pressure: \" + extremeData.getPressure() + \" hPa\");\n System.out.println(\" Please take necessary precautions!\");\n }\n \n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u8ba1\u7b97\u8212\u9002\u5ea6\u7b49\u7ea7\n */\n private String getComfortLevel() {\n if (currentWeatherData == null) {\n return \"Unknown\";\n }\n \n float temp = currentWeatherData.getTemperature();\n float humidity = currentWeatherData.getHumidity();\n \n if (temp >= 20 && temp <= 26 && humidity >= 40 && humidity <= 60) {\n return \"Very Comfortable \ud83d\ude0a\";\n } else if (temp >= 18 && temp <= 28 && humidity >= 30 && humidity <= 70) {\n return \"Comfortable \ud83d\ude42\";\n } else if (temp >= 15 && temp <= 32 && humidity >= 25 && humidity <= 80) {\n return \"Acceptable \ud83d\ude10\";\n } else if (temp >= 10 && temp <= 35 && humidity >= 20 && humidity <= 85) {\n return \"Uncomfortable \ud83d\ude15\";\n } else {\n return \"Very Uncomfortable \ud83d\ude30\";\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getName() {\n return name;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u5f53\u524d\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\n */\n public WeatherStation.WeatherData getCurrentWeatherData() {\n return currentWeatherData;\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"WeatherDisplay{name='\" + name + \"'}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "demo1/src/main/java/org/example/demo1/designpatterns/observer/StatisticsDisplay.java", "file_content": "package org.example.demo1.designpatterns.observer;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * \u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u6a21\u5f0f - \u5177\u4f53\u89c2\u5bdf\u8005\u7c7b (Concrete Observer)\n * \n * \u7edf\u8ba1\u663e\u793a\u5668\u7c7b\uff0c\u7528\u4e8e\u6536\u96c6\u548c\u663e\u793a\u5929\u6c14\u6570\u636e\u7684\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\uff0c\n * \u5305\u62ec\u6700\u9ad8\u6e29\u3001\u6700\u4f4e\u6e29\u3001\u5e73\u5747\u6e29\u5ea6\u7b49\u3002\n */\npublic class StatisticsDisplay implements Observer {\n \n private final String name;\n private final List<Float> temperatureHistory = new ArrayList<>();\n private final List<Float> humidityHistory = new ArrayList<>();\n private final List<Float> pressureHistory = new ArrayList<>();\n \n private float maxTemperature = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n private float minTemperature = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n private float maxHumidity = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n private float minHumidity = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n private float maxPressure = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n private float minPressure = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n \n private int updateCount = 0;\n \n public StatisticsDisplay(String name) {\n this.name = name;\n }\n \n @Override\n public void update(Subject subject, String event, Object data) {\n // \u53ea\u5bf9\u6d4b\u91cf\u6570\u636e\u53d8\u5316\u4e8b\u4ef6\u611f\u5174\u8da3\n if (!WeatherStation.EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED.equals(event)) {\n return;\n }\n \n if (data instanceof WeatherStation.WeatherData) {\n WeatherStation.WeatherData weatherData = (WeatherStation.WeatherData) data;\n updateStatistics(weatherData);\n displayStatistics();\n }\n }\n \n @Override\n public boolean isInterestedIn(String event) {\n // \u53ea\u5bf9\u6d4b\u91cf\u6570\u636e\u53d8\u5316\u4e8b\u4ef6\u611f\u5174\u8da3\n return WeatherStation.EVENT_MEASUREMENTS_CHANGED.equals(event);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u66f4\u65b0\u7edf\u8ba1\u6570\u636e\n */\n private void updateStatistics(WeatherStation.WeatherData weatherData) {\n updateCount++;\n \n float temperature = weatherData.getTemperature();\n float humidity = weatherData.getHumidity();\n float pressure = weatherData.getPressure();\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6e29\u5ea6\u7edf\u8ba1\n temperatureHistory.add(temperature);\n if (temperature > maxTemperature) {\n maxTemperature = temperature;\n }\n if (temperature < minTemperature) {\n minTemperature = temperature;\n }\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6e7f\u5ea6\u7edf\u8ba1\n humidityHistory.add(humidity);\n if (humidity > maxHumidity) {\n maxHumidity = humidity;\n }\n if (humidity < minHumidity) {\n minHumidity = humidity;\n }\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6c14\u538b\u7edf\u8ba1\n pressureHistory.add(pressure);\n if (pressure > maxPressure) {\n maxPressure = pressure;\n }\n if (pressure < minPressure) {\n minPressure = pressure;\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u663e\u793a\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n private void displayStatistics() {\n System.out.println(\"\\n=== \" + name + \" Statistics ===\");\n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udcc8 Weather Statistics (Based on \" + updateCount + \" readings):\");\n \n // \u6e29\u5ea6\u7edf\u8ba1\n System.out.println(\"\ud83c\udf21\ufe0f Temperature:\");\n System.out.printf(\" Max: %.1f\u00b0C | Min: %.1f\u00b0C | Avg: %.1f\u00b0C%n\", \n maxTemperature, minTemperature, getAverageTemperature());\n \n // \u6e7f\u5ea6\u7edf\u8ba1\n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udca7 Humidity:\");\n System.out.printf(\" Max: %.1f%% | Min: %.1f%% | Avg: %.1f%%%n\", \n maxHumidity, minHumidity, getAverageHumidity());\n \n // \u6c14\u538b\u7edf\u8ba1\n System.out.println(\"\ud83c\udf2a\ufe0f Pressure:\");\n System.out.printf(\" Max: %.1f hPa | Min: %.1f hPa | Avg: %.1f hPa%n\", \n maxPressure, minPressure, getAveragePressure());\n \n // \u8d8b\u52bf\u5206\u6790\n displayTrends();\n \n System.out.println(\"=== End \" + name + \" Statistics ===\\n\");\n }\n \n /**\n * \u663e\u793a\u8d8b\u52bf\u5206\u6790\n */\n private void displayTrends() {\n if (temperatureHistory.size() < 2) {\n return;\n }\n \n System.out.println(\"\ud83d\udcca Trends:\");\n \n // \u6e29\u5ea6\u8d8b\u52bf\n String tempTrend = getTrend(temperatureHistory);\n System.out.println(\" Temperature: \" + tempTrend);\n \n // \u6e7f\u5ea6\u8d8b\u52bf\n String humidityTrend = getTrend(humidityHistory);\n System.out.println(\" Humidity: \" + humidityTrend);\n \n // \u6c14\u538b\u8d8b\u52bf\n String pressureTrend = getTrend(pressureHistory);\n System.out.println(\" Pressure: \" + pressureTrend);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8ba1\u7b97\u6570\u636e\u8d8b\u52bf\n */\n private String getTrend(List<Float> data) {\n if (data.size() < 2) {\n return \"Insufficient data\";\n }\n \n int size = data.size();\n int recentCount = Math.min(5, size); // \u53d6\u6700\u8fd15\u4e2a\u6570\u636e\u70b9\n \n float recentAvg = 0;\n float previousAvg = 0;\n \n // \u8ba1\u7b97\u6700\u8fd1\u51e0\u4e2a\u6570\u636e\u7684\u5e73\u5747\u503c\n for (int i = size - recentCount; i < size; i++) {\n recentAvg += data.get(i);\n }\n recentAvg /= recentCount;\n \n // \u8ba1\u7b97\u4e4b\u524d\u51e0\u4e2a\u6570\u636e\u7684\u5e73\u5747\u503c\n int previousCount = Math.min(recentCount, size - recentCount);\n if (previousCount > 0) {\n for (int i = size - recentCount - previousCount; i < size - recentCount; i++) {\n previousAvg += data.get(i);\n }\n previousAvg /= previousCount;\n \n float difference = recentAvg - previousAvg;\n if (Math.abs(difference) < 0.1) {\n return \"Stable \u27a1\ufe0f\";\n } else if (difference > 0) {\n return \"Rising \u2b06\ufe0f (+\" + String.format(\"%.1f\", difference) + \")\";\n } else {\n return \"Falling \u2b07\ufe0f (\" + String.format(\"%.1f\", difference) + \")\";\n }\n }\n \n return \"Stable \u27a1\ufe0f\";\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8ba1\u7b97\u5e73\u5747\u6e29\u5ea6\n */\n private float getAverageTemperature() {\n if (temperatureHistory.isEmpty()) {\n return 0;\n }\n return (float) temperatureHistory.stream().mapToDouble(Float::doubleValue).average().orElse(0);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8ba1\u7b97\u5e73\u5747\u6e7f\u5ea6\n */\n private float getAverageHumidity() {\n if (humidityHistory.isEmpty()) {\n return 0;\n }\n return (float) humidityHistory.stream().mapToDouble(Float::doubleValue).average().orElse(0);\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8ba1\u7b97\u5e73\u5747\u6c14\u538b\n */\n private float getAveragePressure() {\n if (pressureHistory.isEmpty()) {\n return 0;\n }\n return (float) pressureHistory.stream().mapToDouble(Float::doubleValue).average().orElse(0);\n }\n \n @Override\n public String getName() {\n return name;\n }\n \n /**\n * \u91cd\u7f6e\u7edf\u8ba1\u6570\u636e\n */\n public void resetStatistics() {\n temperatureHistory.clear();\n humidityHistory.clear();\n pressureHistory.clear();\n \n maxTemperature = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n minTemperature = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n maxHumidity = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n minHumidity = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n maxPressure = Float.MIN_VALUE;\n minPressure = Float.MAX_VALUE;\n \n updateCount = 0;\n \n System.out.println(name + \" statistics have been reset.\");\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u7edf\u8ba1\u6458\u8981\n */\n public String getStatisticsSummary() {\n if (updateCount == 0) {\n return \"No data collected yet\";\n }\n \n return String.format(\"Statistics Summary: %d readings, Temp(%.1f-%.1f\u00b0C), Humidity(%.1f-%.1f%%), Pressure(%.1f-%.1f hPa)\",\n updateCount, minTemperature, maxTemperature, \n minHumidity, maxHumidity, minPressure, maxPressure);\n }\n \n @Override\n public String toString() {\n return \"StatisticsDisplay{name='\" + name + \"', readings=\" + updateCount + \"}\";\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File
